name: tvOS 17
available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved redaction of sensitive information.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to break out of Web Content sandbox
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of protocols.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use-after-free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to access user-sensitive data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An attacker in physical proximity can cause a limited out of bounds write
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: A privacy issue was addressed with improved private data redaction for log entries.

cves.credit: Adam M., and Noah Roskin-Frazee and Professor Jason Lau (ZeroClicks.ai Lab)

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may fail to enforce App Transport Security
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of protocols.

cves.credit: Will Brattain at Trail of Bits

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An attacker that has already achieved kernel code execution may be able to bypass kernel memory mitigations
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges

advisories.impact: A remote user may cause an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV HD and Apple TV 4K (all models)
advisories.impact: An app may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
